scenario_text.value:
Takuma, is it just me or do things feel kinda
weird in here?

This is a restroom. People come here to...um,
take care of business. Uh, at any rate...

I don’t think they’d leave a first-aid kit in
a place like this.

Lookit all these weird bowls lined up like
this!

Huh, all of those toilets seem pretty worse
for wear.
How do you use this thing, anyway?

Oh, you push this to flush the water out when
you’re done.

Looks like it works all right. Guess we can
use these with no problem.

Still, it’s weird... Why are these toilets
working when the school’s in such bad shape?

(Is there someone around to clean them?
I highly doubt it...)

(I’d better bring that first-aid kit back to
Labramon as soon as I can!)

This is a “ress rum”? So weird! Are they
always this sticky?

(I wonder what’s bothering Agumon? Should
I check things with my camera, just in case?)

...What the heck am I doing? And at a time
like this...
